item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, January 3, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Digital gardens people maintain outside the "Big Tech" walled gardens (33 points | 13 comments)
2. iTerm2 critical security release (491 points | 268 comments)
3. Covid 5 years later: Learning from a pandemic many are forgetting (33 points | 10 comments)
4. Kuvasz-streamer: open-source CDC for Postgres for low latency replication (31 points | discuss)
5. Zildjian, a 400-year-old cymbal-making company in Massachusetts (316 points | 156 comments)
6. Advent of Code 2024 in pure SQL (307 points | 69 comments)
7. JPL Horizons on-line solar system data and ephemeris computation service (8 points | 2 comments)
8. Multispectral imaging through scattering media and around corners (11 points | discuss)
9. Optimizing Ruby's JSON, Part 4 (119 points | 15 comments)
10. Be a property owner and not a renter on the internet (194 points | 107 comments)
11. The Alder Lake SHLX Anomaly (120 points | 40 comments)
12. Shmøergh Hog – The making of a simple analog synth (67 points | 2 comments)
13. TinyStories: How Small Can Language Models Be and Still Speak Coherent English? (2023) (163 points | 75 comments)
14. Ask HN: How to learn marketing and sales as a solo entrepreneur? (114 points | 32 comments)
15. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (January 2025) (245 points | 198 comments)
16. Diagnosing an Unusual WiFi Issue (2020) (198 points | 71 comments)

19. DOOM CAPTCHA (1173 points | 258 comments)
20. I am rich and have no idea what to do (515 points | 861 comments)
21. Rules for writing software tutorials (173 points | 35 comments)
22. uBlock Origin GPL code being stolen by team behind honey browser extension (717 points | 334 comments)
23. Building a Knowledge System That Enhances Rather Than Replaces Thought (88 points | 24 comments)
24. UpCodes (YC S17) is hiring remote recruiters to help make buildings cheaper ( | hide)
25. What Is miniKanren? (198 points | 108 comments)
26. U.S. appeals court strikes down FCC's net neutrality rules (207 points | 188 comments)
27. Linux Context Switching Internals: Process State and Memory (138 points | 2 comments)
28. PlasticList's Advice for Food Companies (101 points | 71 comments)
29. Show HN: Made a small JavaScript benchmarking app – BenchJS (19 points | 2 comments)
